text:
January 4, 1960
Irving R. Merrill
Television Station WMSB
Michigan State University
East Lansing, Michigan
Dear Irv:
5^
Congratulations on the new position. It
sounds wonderful. Certainly wish you the
best of luck there. San Francisco is a great
place to live, as I am sure you well know.
I have no idea what will be happening to
the NAEB Research Committee in 1960. HowÂ¬
ever, I have forwarded your letter to
Harry Skornia so that he will be aware of
your move and your continued interest in
NAEB
Sincerely,
Samuel L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
SLB:ks
